title: Random thought on the topic of Mordekaiser Botlane
body: So I was just chatting with my friend about the story of Mordekaiser ADC and a random thought occurred to me: What if Mordekaiser had a passive that made all auto attacks have reduced range against him? It would definitely make him easier to balance as a botlane role, as ADC's couldn't poke him as effortlessly as now. I don't know sh*t about balancing, but maybe it would be a thought to linger upon

replies.body: Honestly Morde is fine how he is. His play in the bot lane really isn't that popular and isn't his main function. He's mostly a top laner, and if done right, and I am speaking as a Mordekaiser main, he's an amazing top laner.
Or why not just give him a small sivir/vayne range and make him an short range bruiser adc.
